General.Name: Unimicron Technology Corp
General.Description: Unimicron Technology Corp. engages in the development, manufacturing, processing, and sale of printed circuit boards, electrical equipment, electronic products, and testing and burn-in systems for integrated circuit products worldwide. It also provides IC testing products, HDIs, FPCs, ELICs, multi-layer and rigid flex PCS; and IC carriers, as well as connectors, and TP and ECRM. Unimicron Technology Corp. was incorporated in 1990 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 177, Shan Ying Rd., Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333
